document.full_text: the findings from more than 90 minutes of illicit tobacco use suggested that while new yorkers may care about a lot of things, smoking in a public park is not high on the list.
document.title: smoking leisurely, and illegally, in the park
lines_and_colors: the findings from more than 90 minutes of illicit tobacco use suggested that while new yorkers may care about a lot of things, smoking in a public park is not high on the list.
